outcome.title: Geometric Optimization
outcome.description: Sketch the feasible region of a linear optimization problem and identify the optimal solution geomtrically.

outcome.title: Simplex Pivots
outcome.description: Identify valid pivot positions in a tableau and be able to perform a simplex pivot.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Feasible Canonical Problems
outcome.description: Find the optimal solution for feasible canonical problem.

outcome.title: Unboundedness
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.

outcome.title: Feasibility
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.
